name: akamai-nginx
description: generate nginx config from akamai property

scripts.test: npm run build && EDGEGRID_ENV=test cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout 10000 --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill ./dist/test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && rimraf dist/ && babel ./ --out-dir dist/ --ignore ./node_modules,./lua/akamai.lua,./papiJson,./ssl,.env,./.babelrc,./npm-debug.log --copy-files
scripts.start:
npm run build && echo '
#### STARTING ####' && node dist/start.js
scripts.start-local:
npm run build && echo '
#### STARTING ####' && node dist/start-local.js
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
